name: mcp-server-masscan
description: Fast port scanner for large-scale network discovery using Masscan through MCP interface

rating.reason: The documentation has significant quality issues: the description lacks proper punctuation and clear structure, parameter descriptions contain formatting artifacts and incomplete information (e.g., 'Additional masscan arguments --max-rate' with trailing whitespace), and examples are redundant or unclear. The target parameter shows the same example twice, and the masscan_args description is incomplete. While the basic functionality is somewhat discernible, the poor formatting and incomplete explanations make this difficult to use confidently.
